name: Only One One
description:
A JOL Studios Production

There are 50 "one"s in this single-leveled arena game, and you are one of them. "One"s try to avoid bumping into one another.

If they happen to smash together an evil creature is created whose only purpose is to chase the "one"s and catch them. Upon devouring the "one"s, those evil creatures gets bigger and faster.

Your goal is to stay alive until you are the last "one" left in the arena.

Controls: Left/Right (or A/D, Left Stick on XBox controller) to turn and Up/Down (or W/S, Right Stick) to move.
You can press Return (A Button) to start a new game.
